alert.note: Alert for Allamakee (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 25 at 4:47AM CST until January 25 at 12:00PM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter or less in dense fog. * WHERE...In Iowa, Allamakee County. In Minnesota, Fillmore, Houston, and Olmsted Counties. In Wisconsin, Crawford, Richland, and Vernon Counties. * WHEN...Until noon CST today. * IMPACTS...Low visibility could make driving conditions hazardous. Freezing fog in some areas could also produce slippery stretches on some untreated roads.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use low-beam headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
